path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Carbify NFT Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Overlaping of tokenId indexes of NFTs would lead minting of NFT at same tokenId
findings.description: At NftreeFactory.sol#L151-152 incorrect firstIndex and lastIndex get calculated during ecoEmpire and backup initialization, leading to overlapping of indexes and potential minting of NFTs at the same tokenId.

findings.title: Incorrect fees precedence
findings.description: In updateFees function at Nftree.sol#L220-221, fee1, fee2 & fee3 are set but all are validated against MAX_FEE without additional check that MAX_FEE >= fee1 > fee2 > fee3, defeating the purpose of having different fees value for different period of deposit.

findings.title: Multiple deposits of CBY for a tokenId would lead to pay more fees by the users
findings.description: Multiple deposits of CBY for a tokenId result in users paying more fees.
